ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the other looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other,

Sinesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when t=
he other looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each=
 other, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

Plintis=
sa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they walked off to the Ark. Onc=
e there, they entered the base.

"Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by h=
ere just staring?" Plintissa asked. Dracona started to look around in logic=
al places a lunatic might hide.

Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting aro=
und and drinking tea and they left again.

"Who shall we join with, dear?" =
Inzola asked.

"Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk o=
n until they see the Alliance base.

"This one looks good, lets go and ask =
them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked u=
p to the base.

"Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join your fine team,=
 we have been looking for a faction to join, and it appears that it is you =
who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join you, what fo =
we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, please, no kil=
ling a bot things or anything.)

Gangon had a nightmare, He was again tied =
to the magical chair when Sinister and Sinesis came up to him. Then BrightB=
lade did, and then Dracona. They all pulled of their masks and were 2 heade=
d, one head Inzola, and the other head Deemos. Gangon screamed and held hbi=
s head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remembered that he couldn't move. He co=
nsidered that thing about getting a replacement body, how it would be a goo=
d idea just in case he had to get out of this dump, which was probable if h=
e wanted to kill himself. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona to come back.=


The Radicons looked at Infectra.

"Now, all you need to do is follow us, =
we have set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing=
 as how you would make a great addition to their group." Airbomber said. Th=
ey walked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

Arti=
st walked around the war room in circles, not quite knowing where he was go=
ing.
